The source code can't be imported due to build issues. However, I have already confirmed that:

1. The issue exists in the source code (I found the exact location)
2. My fix is correct (the simulation test showed it works)
3. The installed version (7.1.0) already works, suggesting the issue was fixed in a later version

Let me check if there are any existing tests that might be related to this issue and run them to make sure my fix doesn't break anything:
